# Lec 6.2: Thu 10/12

## Today

1. Attempt 2: Knit term paper document. If you were **NOT** able to knit `term_paper.Rmd` last lecture: 
    1. Install the `tinytex` package
    1. Run `tinytex::install_tinytex()`. If you get a warning that "a LaTeX distribution may have existed in the system." say yes anyways.
    1. Open and close RStudio
    1. Try knitting `term_paper/term_paper.Rmd` again. If you get a warning that you need to run `tinytex::reinstall_tinytex()`, do so.
    1. If are now able to knit, update your answer in the Roster Google Sheet -> Individuals tab
    1. **If you were NOT able** to knit the document, take a screenshot of your error message, go to Slack `#general` and reply to the thread with it.
